arts.ttl: Elversberg heartbreak as Léo Scienza's late strike keeps Heidenheim in Bundesliga
arts.sum: Léo Scienza scored a 95th-minute winner to preserve Heidenheim's top-flight status and leave Elversberg in the second tier in a dramatic play-off second leg. Following a 2-2 draw in the first leg, Heidenheim started the match with intent, taking the lead in the ninth minute through Mathias Honsak .

arts.ttl: Magic Scienza breaks Elversberg hearts to confirm Heidenheim safety
arts.sum: In the most dramatic of fashions, Heidenheim confirmed their place in the Bundesliga next term, thanks to a sensational late winner.
